titles.title: Jesus Is My Standard Of Living

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus is my standard of living,
I have riches here.
I'm walking in the love of my Lord,
While on this earthy sphere.
I'm content to lay my treasures on the other side.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus in my standard of living.
He's the pattern Son, I'm longing to be like.
He's making me into His image and likeness
So I can be as Christ to the world.
